e: help@pkbtest.com ------=_Part_2382_521937558.1673399482178-- ------=_Part_2381_1506909487.1673399482178-- ------=_Part_2380_784507252.1673399482178-- , Date: Wed, 11 Jan 2023 01:11:22 +0000 (UTC) From: Patients Know Best To: Emis Patient 1 Message-ID: <1079043651.2387.1673399482302@5513d340c793> Subject: You are connected to a new team at Org A MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_Part_2384_963274563.1673399482299" ------=_Part_2384_963274563.1673399482299 Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="----=_Part_2385_1824206138.1673399482299" ------=_Part_2385_1824206138.1673399482299 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_2386_228727399.1673399482300" ------=_Part_2386_228727399.1673399482300 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Dear Emis, Org A has connected your Patients Know Best (PKB) record to a new team that is, or has been, working with you. The team's name is Team AZ. Why has this happened? Team AZ holds information about you or for you. PKB links you to the team so you can see information about you (such as test results) and information for you (such as library links). In some cases, you can interact with the team (through secure messaging). Your PKB record is a single place to store information from you, your health professionals and your medical devices. To learn more about PKB, please visit our website: http://pkb-frontend-2 What happens next? When you have registered, if Team AZ sends you information, PKB will notify you by email. What if I do not know the Org A or Team AZ team? Sometimes you may see an organisation or team name that is unfamiliar to you. This often happens when health care services share resources for managing their patients' or service users' care. For example, GPs and hospitals sometimes share laboratory systems for your test results, and therefore you may receive data from an organisation you've never been to. How do I know what information they have about me and what they can see about me? The information they have about you or for you so far is in your PKB record. You can log in to see it now: http://pkb-frontend-2 This team is able to see information in your record marked with general privacy. This team is not able to see information marked with social, mental and sexual privacy. You can change the level of access they have at any time by clicking this link (http://pkb-frontend-2/patient/myConsentTeam.action?tab=invitations&subTab=myClinicians) and adjusting their settings, you can read more in the PKB manual (https://manual.patientsknowbest.com/patient/sharing). Please do not reply to this email; this address is not monitored. Log into your record to see your medical information and manage your care: http://pkb-frontend-2 Yours, Patients Know Best Help Team w: www.patientsknowbest.com/contact-us e: help@pkbtest.com ------=_Part_2386_228727399.1673399482300 Content-Type: text/html;charset=UTF-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Dear Emis,

Org A has connected your Patients Know Best (PKB) record to a new team that is, or has been, working with you. The team's name is Team AZ.

Why has this happened?
Team AZ holds information about you or for you. PKB links you to the team so you can see information about you (such as test results) and information for you (such as library links). In some cases, you can interact with the team (through secure messaging).

Your PKB record is a single place to store information from you, your health professionals and your medical devices. To learn more about PKB, please visit our website.

What happens next?
When you have registered, if Team AZ sends you information, PKB will notify you by email.

[Date: Wed, 11 Jan 2023 01:11:25 +0000 (UTC) From: Patients Know Best To: Emis Patient 1 Message-ID: <1826374775.2411.1673399485585@5513d340c793> Subject: Sharing disabled for Emis Patient 1 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_Part_2408_1104590621.1673399485576" ------=_Part_2408_1104590621.1673399485576 Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="----=_Part_2409_1144840532.1673399485576" ------=_Part_2409_1144840532.1673399485576 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_2410_2119373933.1673399485576" ------=_Part_2410_2119373933.1673399485576 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Dear Mrs Emis Patient 1,
This is confirmation that sharing has been disabled on your Patients Know Best record by the Privacy Officer - Mr EMIS Privacy Officer from EMIS Org name as of 11 Jan 2023. Your data are now not accessible to anyone except you, even during an emergency. If you wish to re-enable sharing you will need to contact the Privacy Officer. Please do not reply to this email; this address is not monitored. Log into your record to see your medical information and manage your care: http://pkb-frontend-2 Yours, Patients Know Best Help Team w: www.patientsknowbest.com/contact-us e: help@pkbtest.com ------=_Part_2410_2119373933.1673399485576 Content-Type: text/html;charset=UTF-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Dear Mrs Emis Patient 1,
This is confirmation that sharing has been disabled on your Patients Know Best record by the Privacy Officer - Mr EMIS Privacy Officer from EMIS Org name as of 11 Jan 2023.
Your data are now not accessible to anyone except you, even during an emergency. If you wish to re-enable sharing you will need to contact the Privacy Officer.

Please do not reply to this email; this address is not monitored. Log into your record to see your medical information and manage your care.

Yours,

Patients Know Best Help Team
